testCase.desc: To pause and resume the test application container launched in pre-requisite and check the container state
To pause and resume the test application container which is not running
To suspend and resume Test Application through RDKShell and check the container state
To pause and resume the test application with empty ID
To verify the container events of the test application by changing application state
To verify the start and stop container with empty ID
To stop and list the Test Application container
To Verify the container state after stopping the container with force parameter as false
To check the running test application container info
To Verify the container state after stopping the container with force parameter as true
Validates statechange event on Activating/deactivating the plugin
Check if able to get the container state with empty value
To stop and list the Test Application container with force as true
To pause and resume the test application container launched in pre-requisite and check the container Information
To Suspend and resume the test application container launched in pre-requisite and check the container Information
To Start container by passing empty budle path and check the container status
Check if able to start the test application container by specifying bundle path and to suspend/resume the running container
To check the running test application container info by passing empty ID
Check if able to stop the container by passing default force value
To pause the already paused test application container
To stop and list the Test Application container which is already stopped
To resume and list the Test Application container which is already running
Validates all event on Activating/deactivating the plugin
Verify that the getContainerInfo method returns an error when containerId is not provided
